title: Bachelorette Angie Kent enjoys a steamy kiss with Ciarran Stott
text:
Ciarran Stott is the flamboyant, cheerful British lad trying to win over Angie Kent on The Bachelorette.

And on Wednesday night's episode, the 26-year-old hunk certainly tugged at her heart strings.

The pair enjoyed a steamy kiss on a single date, with Angie admitting to being sexually attracted to the blond.

'We have a lot of sexual chemistry': Bachelorette Angie Kent (pictured), 29, enjoyed a steamy kiss with Ciarran Stott after he won the stand-up comedy challenge on Wednesday

Ciarran impressed Angie in the group stand-up challenge, earning himself a single date in the garden of a Sydney winery.

After sharing a few jokes, Angie, 29, presented the Englishman with a rose before leaning in for a steamy kiss.

'You always seem to make me laugh. You just always seem to step up and we have a really good time, and I see you have a serious side as well,' Angie told Ciarran.

Caught her attention: Ciarran (pictured), 26, impressed Angie in the group stand-up challenge, earning himself a single date in the garden of a Sydney winery

The former nightclub performer described their date as 'mint' and opened up on his 'connection' with Angie.

'Angie is an amazing kisser. It was like fireworks. I feel like I'm on cloud nine right now, and I just didn't want it to end.'

The feelings were mutual, with Angie saying in a piece to camera: 'Ciarran and I, we do have a lot of sexual chemistry and he is a very good kisser.

Chemistry: After sharing a few jokes on their one-on-one date, Angie presented the Englishman with a rose before leaning in for a steamy kiss

'I love being around him, I'm very attracted to him,' she added.

Returning to the mansion, Ciarran decided to be coy when asked by his co-stars as to whether they shared a kiss.

'They're all interrogating me about my one-on-one time with Angie, asking me if I kissed her,' he said in a piece to camera. 'Well, Ciarran ain't kissing and telling.'
description: Ciarran Stott is the flamboyant, cheerful British lad trying to win over Angie Kent on The Bachelorette.
authors: Kristy Johnson For Daily Mail Australia
